## type RegistryConfig

```go
type RegistryConfig struct {
    Mirrors   []string
    PlainHTTP *bool
    Insecure  *bool
    RootCAs   [][]byte
    KeyPairs  []TLSKeyPair
}
```

## type TLSKeyPair

```go
type TLSKeyPair struct {
    Key         []byte
    Certificate []byte
}
```
